title: Legal Notice
content: This website is managed by Agroforja, with CIF 45421346-A and address at Ctra Pinillos, S/N, 40393, Pinillos de Polendos, Segovia.
The platform is a meeting point and does not intervene in transactions nor is it responsible for the quality or food safety of the exchanged products.

Products available on ecoanuncios.com are intended exclusively for exchange between private individuals. Their sale, resale, or use in hospitality establishments is prohibited. Ecoanuncios.com acts merely as an intermediary and assumes no responsibility for the misuse of the platform or for any incidents arising from the exchanged products.
